file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 25-23-05-04 - SERVICE DOOR LINING PANELS - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL SERVICE DOOR LINING PANELS - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove/install the service door lining panels. B. The service door lining panels are installed at zone 821. C. The service door lining panels include a main liner assembly, a middle liner assembly, and an arm liner. D. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY SERVICE DOOR LINING PANELS - RE- ALL 25-23-05-000-801-A MOVAL SERVICE DOOR LINING PANELS - IN- ALL 25-23-05-400-801-A STALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 25-23-05 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-23-05-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. SERVICE DOOR LINING PANELS - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to remove the service door lining panels. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 52-43-03-000-801-A/400 SERVICE DOOR FOLDING FLAP - REMOVAL C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Passenger cabin I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Release the folding flap rod (AMM TASK 52-43-03-000-801-A/400). J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Remove the upper hinge liner (1). NOTE: The upper hinge liner is attached with Velcro fasteners. (2) Remove the tiedown strap. (3) Release the SP7376 and SP7377 harnesses of the service-door external emergency light (4) Remove the screws (3) and washers (4) that attach the middle liner assembly (2). (5) Remove the screws (6) and washers (7) that attach the main liner assembly (5). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 25-23-05 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (6) Remove the screws (9), bushings (10), washers (11) and nuts (12) that attach the locking handle assembly (13) of the service door. Refer to DET D, Figure 401. (7) Remove the arm liner (8). NOTE: The arm liner is attached with Velcro fasteners. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 25-23-05 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Service Door Lining Panels - Removal/Installation Figure 401 9. SCREW D 10. BUSHING 10. BUSHING 11. WASHER 12. NUT 9. SCREW 10. BUSHING A ZONE 821 13. HANDLE 8. ARM LINER 10. BUSHING VIEW A 11. WASHER DET. D 12. NUT A B 1. UPPER HINGE LINER SP7376 VIEW B B 7. WASHER SP7377 C 6. SCREW DET. A 4. WASHER 3. SCREW 5. MAIN LINER ASSY DET. B DET. C 2. MIDDLE LINER ASSY 145AMM250345.MCE A EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 25-23-05 Page 4 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-23-05-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. SERVICE DOOR LINING PANELS - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to install the service door lining panels. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 52-43-03-400-801-A/400 SERVICE DOOR FOLDING FLAP - INSTALLATION C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Passenger cabin I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Install the arm liner (8). NOTE: The arm liner is attached with Velcro fasteners. (2) Install the locking handle assembly (13) of the service door with the screws (9), bushings (10), washers (11) and nuts (12). Refer to DET D, Figure 401. (3) Install the main liner assembly (5) with the screws (6) and washers (7). (4) Install the middle liner assembly (2) with the screws (3) and washers (4). (5) Install the SP7376 and SP7377 harnesses of the service-door external emergency light. (6) Install the tiedown strap. (7) Install the upper hinge liner (1). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 25-23-05 Page 5 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL NOTE: The upper hinge liner is attached with Velcro fasteners. J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install the folding flap rod (AMM TASK 52-43-03-400-801-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 25-23-05 Page 6 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
